quotes.statistical_relevance: "statistical_relevance": "This quote expresses strong negative sentiment without any positive undertones, directly illustrating the inverse relationship where high negative sentiment means zero positive sentiment.",
statistical_targets: strong negative correlation between positive and negative sentiment
strong negative correlation between positive and negative sentiment
curated_evidence.curation_instructions: Review all 10 quotes across both documents to find the best examples that illustrate the perfect negative correlation between positive and negative sentiment. For every quote with high positive sentiment, expect to find a corresponding quote with low or zero negative sentiment, and vice-versa. Curate all 10 quotes to provide a complete picture of this statistical relationship.
